name: XCUIElement.SizeClass
desc: The user interface size classes you can inspect in a UI test.

items.name: case regular
items.desc: A constant that represents an element for the regular size class.

items.name: case compact
items.desc: A constant that represents an element for the compact size class.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: A constant that represents an element for the unspecified size class.
